overview:
A veteran in the IP data networking industry, with over 15 years of experience and a proven track record. I started my networking career in 1997 at a Gold value added reseller for Cisco Systems, Planetary Networks. I focused on large enterprise and service provider networks from the core to the edge. In 2001, I started Hula Networks with my two business partners, Steve Robinson and Joe Commendatore. As a business owner and acting CFO my responsibilities and skill sets focus on operations, accounting, and sales. My areas of data IP network expertise include design and integration in enterprise campus WAN and LAN environments, core routing and switching, data center build outs, and WAN acceleration, application control, sever load balancing, wireless, security, and more.

Hula’s mission is to help our clients increase profits, decrease expenses, and mitigate risk. We work hard to increase our client’s productivity and revenues by addressing the gaps in their current communication infrastructure and company procedures. Hula Networks takes great pride in introducing the right technology to our clients while factoring their specific business needs and budgetary restraints into the equation. We focus on designing, installing and supporting the network infrastructure that is best for our clients needs.

I am highly responsive, excellent with follow up, accountable, customer centric, knowledgeable on technologies from the desk top to the cloud. Hula Networks has positioned ourselves to offer a best of breed solution without influence of any one OEM. We are customer centric, vendor agnostic. Our leading OEM partnerships represent, Adtran, Barracuda, Blue Coat, Brocade, Dell Equallogic, EMC, Force10 Networks, Fortinet, Palo Alto Networks, Riverbed, Ruckus Wireless and VMWARE. We are also partnered with many other industry leading manufacturers such as A10 Networks, Extreme Networks, Juniper Networks, VSS Monitoring and more. Strengthened by these partnerships, Hula Networks has both the technical knowledge and resources to design, source, configure, implement, and support all of our clients IT needs.
